availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Burgess M. Preston (Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Preston. Father of Samuel W. Preston, Mar H. Preston, Winfield M. Preston, John H. C. Preston, Alice A. Preston, Clayton R. Preston, and Josephine Preston. Farmer in Johnson County in 1850 and 1860. Colonel of the 65th Regiment of Kentucky Militia in Johnson County in 1864.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 118B; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, Paintsville, p. 82; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States_ (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, Paintsville, p. 18; KYR-0002-022-0076.
